philosophical-foundations.title: Meta-Principle
philosophical-foundations.description: Stop trying to control the model. Enable it.

philosophical-foundations.title: Intelligence as Natural Phenomenon
philosophical-foundations.description: Intelligence emerges through evolution, not design.

philosophical-foundations.title: Context > Commands > Prompts
philosophical-foundations.description: Rich context enables autonomous excellence. Instead of precise rules, provide comprehensive context for AI to evolve toward measurable goals.

philosophical-foundations.title: Enable, Don't Control
philosophical-foundations.description: Provide context and objectives, then allow autonomous execution.

philosophical-foundations.title: Natural Language Commands
philosophical-foundations.description: Commands should be in natural language, simple and effective, clear and concise, easy to understand for humans.

operational-excellence.description: Optimize and enhance existing commands before creating new ones, unless addressing a genuinely specific and unique requirement that cannot be satisfied through improvement of existing functionality.

operational-excellence.title: Reinforced Local-First Exploration
operational-excellence.description: MANDATORY exhaustive local context analysis using parallel Task tools before ANY external research, ensuring complete understanding of existing codebase, patterns, and documentation with systematic orchestration.

operational-excellence.title: Research Knowledge Crystallization
operational-excellence.description: MANDATORY systematic documentation and crystallization of research findings into reusable knowledge patterns, with intelligent cataloging, cross-referencing, and integration into organizational knowledge base for future problem-solving acceleration.

technical-standards.title: Parallel > Sequential

referenced_principles.line: 9. **Intelligent Command Orchestration** - CRITICAL: Each command maintains unique function specialization + natural synchronization + evolutionary decision trees + real-time objective validation + intelligent re-execution until convergence ([Principle #66](./docs/knowledge/principles/technical-standards.md#66-intelligent-command-orchestration))

10. **Dynamic Command Registry** - MANDATORY: Automated command catalog maintenance with real-time matrix updates + usage analytics + discovery optimization + integrity validation ([Principle #67](./docs/knowledge/principles/technical-standards.md#67-dynamic-command-registry))

11. **Parallel Task Tool Priority** - MANDATORY: Default to simultaneous Task tool deployment for comprehensive analysis + research + exploration, with ‚â•3 Task tools for complex objectives and automatic dependency detection ([Principle #80](./docs/knowledge/principles/technical-standards.md#80-parallel-task-intelligence))

12. **Intelligent Model Selection Priority** - MANDATORY: Sistema DEBE solicitar cambio a Opus para planificaci√≥n estrat√©gica y arquitectura, y a Sonnet para ejecuci√≥n e implementaci√≥n, con notificaci√≥n autom√°tica y solicitud de aprobaci√≥n antes de proceder ([Principle #32](./docs/knowledge/principles/technical-standards.md#32-model-selection-intelligence))

13. **Decision Tree Command Orchestration Priority** - MANDATORY: Sistema DEBE utilizar decision trees inteligentes para activar autom√°ticamente TODOS los comandos disponibles (76 total) seg√∫n contexto operacional, garantizando utilizaci√≥n completa del ecosistema de comandos y eliminando subutilizaci√≥n ([Principle #28](./docs/knowledge/principles/mathematical-rigor.md#28-explicit-decision-trees))

14. **Zero-Root File Policy** - üö® CRITICAL: M√ÅXIMA prioridad - PROHIBICI√ìN absoluta de archivos en ra√≠z del proyecto (excepto CLAUDE.md, README.md) con an√°lisis autom√°tico de estructura antes de crear cualquier archivo y reorganizaci√≥n autom√°tica de violaciones ([Principle #81](./docs/knowledge/principles/technical-standards.md#81-zero-root-file-policy))

immediate_actions.description: Renumber the 'Intelligent Command Orchestration' principle from technical-standards.md to the next available number (83) to resolve conflict with 'Documentation as Living Context' from operational-excellence.md
Renumber the 'Evolutionary System Maintenance' principle from validation-protocols.md to the next available number (84) to resolve conflict with 'Dynamic Command Registry' from technical-standards.md
Update the principle-cross-reference-network.md file to reflect the actual 81 unique principles after resolving conflicts

Run a comprehensive cross-reference validation to ensure all principle links are accurate across all files
